args: tmux new-session -ds main 2>/dev/null || :; { [ -z "$(tmux list-clients -t main)" ] && attach=true || for cpid in $(tmux list-clients -t main -F '#{client_pid}'); do spid=$(ps -o ppid= -p $cpid);pcomm="$(ps -o comm= -p $spid)"; [[ "$pcomm" =~ (Code|vscode|node|supervisor) ]] && attach=false && break; done; test "$attach" != false && exec tmux attach -t main; }; exec tmux new-window -n "vs:${PWD##*/}" -t main
